name: battle-flow-landingpage
description: A companion app for the Go Battle League
author: Gabriel Aguirre <gbiktx@pm.me>

scripts.start: npm run-script clean:project && webpack --env config=dev --progress --profile --color && concurrently "webpack-dev-server --env config=dev" "bundle exec jekyll serve"
scripts.build: npm run-script clean:project && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --env config=prod --progress --profile --color && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production bash scripts/build-jekyll.sh
scripts.build:pwa: npm run-script clean:project && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --env config=pwa --progress --profile --color && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=pwa bash scripts/build-jekyll.sh && workbox generateSW config/sw.config.js --verbose
